title: SOLD: T209-2 Contentnea Schrader, Danville Virginia Red Sox, PSA 3...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: T209-2 Contentnea Schrader, Danville Virginia Red Sox, PSA 3...
posts.post_content:
For sale, a T209-2 of August Schrader of the Danville Red Sox, a team of the Virginia League.  Anyone who collects this set knows the Danville portrait cards are tough, tough, tough.  

$SOLD net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S. Tax free. 

Commitment to purchase supercedes any ongoing negotiation. 

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
